summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Thirty-first Avenue in the City of Seattle, from East Cherry Street to the north line of White's Addition to the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete walks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 532 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
